version_description:
* Now you can edit or remove genres, songs, and artists that are shown in your profile!
* We have increased the quality of uploaded photos so your matches can see your photos better and more clear.
* With the improvements we made, Freezing problems in "Discover" was fixed.
* We increased the character limit of sending a message to make you feel more comfortable while texting. Now you can send longer messages!

* You can now register just by typing a name and change your name whenever you want
* Discover section is redesigned for you
* You can see the number of people who listen to songs live in Discover
* If the conversation is dying while texting you can get help from suggestion sentences
* You can easily edit your favorite songs and artists on your profile and share on Instagram Stories
* You can share the song you listen to instantly on Instagram or Twitter

* We made it easy for you to send opening profile requests!
* We made some performance improvements for you to use the application better.

You can reach us at any time from Meet The Music account in the "Chat" section in the app, and from our @meetthemusicapp Instagram or Twitter accounts :)

* You can set an alarm for any song you want to be notified immediately when someone is listening!
* We made improvements to the interface for you to use the application comfortably
* We made some performance improvements and fixed bugs.

You can reach us at any time from Meet The Music account in the "Chat" section in the app, and from our @meetthemusicapp Instagram or Twitter accounts :)

We are making some improvements to feel you have a more fun time with Meet The Music. Your happiness and safety is more important than anything else!

Your ideas and advices are very important. You can reach us at any time from Meet The Music account in the "Chat" section in the app, and from our @meetthemusicapp Instagram or Twitter accounts :)
